title: Spaceteam
detail: A physical hardware hot-pluggable version of the popular mobile game Spaceteam.
extended_details: This is a 3-player hardware implementation of the cooperative multiplayer mobile game Spaceteam (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spaceteam). Each player has a console with 3 dial, button, or switch controls and a screen that displays commands. The players must work together to keep up with the commands and set the controls to the correct settings. This project will also allow the controls to be hot plugged and rearranged dynamically between games. Each control will be mounted on a prototype board and have an LCD that displays the control's name and current value, the control itself (a button, toggle switch, or potentiometer), and an ATtiny84. The controls will fit in to a larger console with an LCD that displays instructions. All controls will communicate with a master Arduino Uno over an i2c bus to allow for dynamic reconfiguration of the game layout.
